content: X W Xiao Wang, 王皛(晓) Welcome About I am an (non-tenured) associate professor of Institute for Theoretical Computer Science at SUFE. Before joining SUFE, I did my postdoc at SUTD under supervision of Georgios Piliouras and Ioannis Panageas. I got my B.S. from China University of Geosciences (Beijing) and Ph.D in Mathematics from University at Buffalo, advised by Mohan Ramachandran. Contact Email: wangxiao@sufe.edu.cn Address: Shanghai University of Finance and Economics 100 Wudong Road, Shanghai, China, 200433. Research I am working on machine learning, optimization on manifolds, and game theory. Teaching Fall 2025: Optimization on Manifolds (Graduate). 1:Curves and Surfaces    2:Differentiable Manifolds and Mappings    3:Riemannian Geometry    4:Simplicial and Persistent Homology    5:Riemannian Gradient and Newton's Methods Spring 2025: Linear Algebra (Pilot class). 1:Vectors and Matrices    2:Linear Transformations and Matrix Algebra    3:Theory of Linear Systems    4:Vector Spaces and Dimension    5:Change of Basis and Orthogonality    6:Determinant    7:Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors    8:Quadratic Forms    9:Difference and Differential Equations Publication On Perturbed Natural Adaptive Gradient Descent and its Applications in Portfolio Optimization with Y.
